Package com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.okhttp

Class OkHttpClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.okhttp.OkHttpClientFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpClientFactory, ExternalDocumentLoader
    public class OkHttpClientFactory
extends Object
implements HttpClientFactory, ExternalDocumentLoader
    The ShapeTree library uses a generic interface (`HttpClient`) to execute HTTP queries on the POD and for external documents. The OkHttpClient uses the okhttp library to implement `HttpClient`. This factory generates variations of okhttp those clients depending on the need for SSL validation and ShapeTree validation. okhttp documentation (https://square.github.io/okhttp/4.x/okhttp/okhttp3/-ok-http-client/#okhttpclients-should-be-shared) recommends that instance of the client be shared/reused. OkHttpClientFactory's get() provides an instance of the OkHttpClient which can be re-used for multiple configurations (validation on/off, https verification on/off).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      OkHttpClient get​(boolean useClientShapeTreeValidation)
      Create or re-use okhttp HttpClient.
      DocumentResponse loadExternalDocument​(URL resourceUrl)
      Load a non-POD document This fulfils the ExternalDocumentLoader interface, so this factory can be use in DocumentLoaderManager.setLoader(new OkHttpClientFactory(...));

        public OkHttpClient get​(boolean useClientShapeTreeValidation)

      • loadExternalDocument

        public DocumentResponse loadExternalDocument​(URL resourceUrl)
                                      throws ShapeTreeException
        Load a non-POD document This fulfils the ExternalDocumentLoader interface, so this factory can be use in DocumentLoaderManager.setLoader(new OkHttpClientFactory(...));
        Specified by:
        loadExternalDocument in interface ExternalDocumentLoader
        Parameters:
        resourceUrl - URL of resource to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a DocumentResponse with the results of a successful GET
        Throws:
        ShapeTreeException - if the GET was not successful
